application.name: youyesyet
application.documentation:
At this stage, primarily a data-driven lore repository.
At some future stage, perhaps a specification for the game's internal state.

entity.name: object
entity.documentation: Physical opjects in the game world; it's probable that properties like 'mesh' and 'skin' will end up here.

property.name: id
property.documentation: Note that this key is special, as for every instance of a game object there will be an object record, and thus, for example, every character will have exactly one object record associated with it; thus, for example, the key value in the character table will be the key value of the associated object record.

property.name: x
property.documentation: Easting from the origin, in metres.

property.name: y
property.documentation: Northing from the origin, in metres.

property.name: z
property.documentation: Altitude above the mean sea level, in metres.

property.name: contents
property.documentation: Contents of this object, if it is a container.

entity.name: agent
entity.documentation:
An object with agency: a hierarchy of needs, a planning process, locomotion.
The function used to plan the next action for this agent.

entity.name: character
entity.documentation: A character with a repertoire: knowledge, dialect, voice, et cetera.
